plays.text: Goal scored by Chris Thorburn assisted by Ilya Kovalchuk and Joel Kwiatkowski

Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Daniel Briere and Scott Hartnell

Penalty to Steve McCarthy 2 minutes for Holding Patrick Thoresen
